channel.title: CVE Feed for Recurly -- recurly python module
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Recurly -- recurly python module

item.title: CVE-2017-0906|2024-09-17T00:50:41.168Z -- recurly -- recurly%20python%20module
item.description: The Recurly Client Python Library before 2.0.5, 2.1.16, 2.2.22, 2.3.1, 2.4.5, 2.5.1, 2.6.2 is vulnerable to a Server-Side Request Forgery vulnerability in the "Resource.get" method that could result in compromise of API keys or other critical resources.
